00072     public function init()
00073     {
00074         //  Phone home...
00075         parent::init();
00076 
00077         $this->defaultAction = 'admin';
00078 
00079         //  Add command mappings...
00080         $this->addCommandToMap( 'delete', array( $this, 'commandDelete' ) );
00081         $this->addCommandToMap( 'undelete', array( $this, 'commandUndelete' ) );
00082 
00083         //  Set our access rules..
00084         $this->addUserAction( self::ACCESS_TO_ALL, 'error' );
00085         $this->addUserActions( self::ACCESS_TO_GUEST, array( 'login', 'show', 'list', 'contact' ) );
00086         $this->addUserActions( self::ACCESS_TO_AUTH, array( 'login', 'logout', 'admin', 'create', 'delete', 'update', 'index', 'view' ) );
00087     }

00095     {

00097

00100             'accessControl',

00109     public function accessRules()
00110     {
00111         static $_ruleList;
00112         static $_isInitialized;
00113 
00114         //  Console apps can bypass this...
00115         if ( PS::_a() instanceof CConsoleApplication ) return array();
00116 
00117         //  Build access rule array...
00118         if ( ! isset( $_isInitialized ) )
00119         {
00120             $_ruleList = array();
00121 
00122             for ( $_i = 0; $_i <= self::ACCESS_TO_NONE; $_i++ )
00123             {
00124                 $_theVerb = $_validMatch = null;
00125 
00126                 //  Get the user type
00127                 switch ( $_i )
00128                 {
00129                     case self::ACCESS_TO_ALL:
00130                     case self::ACCESS_TO_ANY:
00131                     case self::ACCESS_TO_ANON:
00132                         $_theVerb = 'allow';
00133                         $_validMatch = '*';
00134                         break;
00135 
00136                     case self::ACCESS_TO_GUEST:
00137                         $_theVerb = 'allow';
00138                         $_validMatch = '?';
00139                         break;
00140 
00141                     case self::ACCESS_TO_AUTH:
00142                         $_theVerb = 'allow';
00143                         $_validMatch = '@';
00144                         break;
00145 
00146                     case self::ACCESS_TO_ADMIN:
00147                         $_theVerb = 'allow';
00148                         $_validMatch = 'admin';
00149                         break;
00150 
00151                     case self::ACCESS_TO_NONE:
00152                         $_theVerb = 'deny';
00153                         $_validMatch = '*';
00154                         break;
00155                 }
00156 
00157                 //  Add to rules array
00158                 if ( $_theVerb && $_validMatch )
00159                 {
00160                     $_tempList = array(
00161                         $_theVerb,
00162                         'actions' => PS::o( $this->m_arUserActionList, $_i ),
00163                         'users' => array( $_validMatch )
00164                     );
00165 
00166                     if ( $_tempList['actions'] == null ) unset( $_tempList['actions'] );
00167 
00168                     $_ruleList[] = $_tempList;
00169                 }
00170             }
00171 
00172             $_isInitialized = true;
00173         }
00174 
00175         //  Return the rules...
00176         return $_ruleList;
00177     }

00187     public function actionLogin()
00188     {
00189         if ( ! Yii::app()->user->isGuest )
00190             return $this->redirect( Yii::app()->user->returnUrl );
00191 
00192         $_sClass = $this->getLoginFormClass();
00193         $_oLogin = new $_sClass();
00194 
00195         if ( isset( $_POST[ $_sClass ] ) )
00196         {
00197             $_oLogin->attributes = $_POST[ $_sClass ];
00198 
00199             //  Validate user input and redirect to previous page if valid
00200             if ( $_oLogin->validate() )
00201                 return $this->redirect( Yii::app()->user->returnUrl );
00202         }
00203 
00204         //  Display the login form
00205         $this->render( 'login', array( 'form' => $_oLogin ) );
00206     }

00233     public function actionUpdate( $options = array(), $fromCreate = false )
00234     {
00235         //  Handle singleViewMode...
00236         $_model = ( $fromCreate ? new $this->m_sModelName : $this->loadModel()  );
00237         $_viewName = ( $fromCreate ? ( $this->_singleViewMode ? 'update' : 'create' ) : 'update' );
00238         
00239         if ( $this->isPostRequest ) $this->saveModel( $_model, $_POST, 'update' );
00240         
00241         $options['update'] = ( ! $fromCreate );
00242         $this->genericAction( $_viewName, $_model, $options );
00243     }
00244 
00249     public function actionView( $options = array() )
00250     {
00251         $_model = $this->loadModel();
00252         $this->genericAction( 'view', $_model, $options );
00253     }

00261     public function actionDelete( $sRedirectAction = 'admin' )
00262     {
00263         if ( Yii::app()->request->isPostRequest )
00264         {
00265             if ( $this->loadModel() )
00266             {
00267                 $this->loadModel()->delete();
00268                 $this->redirect( array( $sRedirectAction ) );
00269             }
00270         }
00271         else
00272         {
00273             if ( isset( $_GET['id'] ) )
00274             {
00275                 $this->loadModel( $_GET['id'] )->delete();
00276                 $this->redirect( array( $sRedirectAction ) );
00277             }
00278         }
00279 
00280         throw new CHttpException( 404, 'Invalid request. Please do not repeat this request again.' );
00281     }

00286     public function actionAdmin( $options = array(), $oCriteria = null )
00287     {
00288         if ( $this->m_sModelName ) @list( $_arModels, $_oCrit, $_oPage, $_oSort ) = $this->loadPaged( true, $oCriteria );
00289         $this->render( 'admin', array_merge( $options, array( 'models' => $_arModels, 'pages' => $_oPage, 'sort' => $_oSort ) ) );
00290     }

00300     protected function commandDelete()
00301     {
00302         $this->loadModel( $_POST[ 'id' ] )->delete();
00303         $this->refresh();
00304     }
00305 
00310     protected function commandUndelete()
00311     {
00312         $this->loadModel( $_POST[ 'id' ] )->delete( true );
00313         $this->refresh();
00314     }
